summary.span: 提供 接口的示例实现。

span.span: Provides an example implementation of the interface.

summary.span: 此类为抽象类。

span.span: This class is abstract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是为派生自的代码生成器的有用基类。This is a useful base class for code generators to derive from. 代码生成器是能够呈现代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM) 关系图的结构根据特定语言的源代码。Code generators are capable of rendering source code in a specific language according to the structure of a Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) graph. 此类提供许多函数和要在 CodeDOM 图中生成特定类型的代码的方法。This class provides many functions and methods to generate specific types of code from a CodeDOM graph. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

span.span: Generates a line-continuation character and outputs the specified string on a new line.

para.span: 在实现支持行继续符 (例如，Visual Basic 中) 的语言中的代码生成器时，此方法应之前它将输出换行字符输出行继续符。

span.span: When implementing a code generator for a language that supports a line-continuation character (for example, Visual Basic), this method should output the line-continuation character before it outputs a newline character.

The escaped identifier for the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试是否与保留的标识符冲突或语言关键字和如果是这样，返回一个等效的带有特定于语言的转义码格式设置的名称。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns an equivalent name with language-specific escape code formatting. 转义标识符引用返回的名称。The returned name is referred to an escaped identifier. 转义的标识符包含相同`value`但包括转义代码格式设置，以使其区别于冲突的关键字。The escaped identifier contains the same `value` but includes escape code formatting to differentiate it from conflicting keywords. 例如，`value`无法前面是 at 符号 ("@") 或由方括号分隔 ("["和"]") 创建转义的标识符。For example, `value` could be preceded by an at sign ("@") or delimited by square brackets ("[" and "]") to create an escaped identifier. > [!NOTE] > 此方法的默认实现没有任何影响。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 测试是否与保留的标识符冲突或语言关键字，以及如果是这样，返回有效的标识符名称不冲突的。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns a valid identifier name that does not conflict. 返回的标识符包含相同`value`但包括转义代码格式设置，以使其区别于冲突的关键字。The returned identifier contains the same `value` but includes escape code formatting to differentiate it from conflicting keywords. 通常情况下，如果值需要修改，它是前面带下划线"_"。Typically, if the value requires modification, it is preceded by an underscore "_". > [!NOTE] > 此方法的默认实现没有任何影响。The default implementation of this method does nothing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据的上下文以不同的方式生成成员的代码。Code for members is generated differently depending on the context. 例如，在接口上的方法或枚举上的字段的代码是以不同的方式从代码生成的类上的同一成员。For example, code for methods on an interface or fields on an enumeration is generated differently from code for the same member on a class. 此实现假设成员生成类上下文。This implementation assumes that the member is being generated for the class context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查以确保它不包含可以用于转义标识符字段某些字符的指定的字符串。This method checks the specified string to ensure that it does not contain certain characters that can be used to escape an identifier field. 方法调用此方法以执行字符串验证。The method calls this method to perform string validation. 调用方法并传入从中生成代码可能会阻止某些字符序列，包括标识符字段中的隐藏的代码的使用之前。Calling the method and passing a before generating code from it can prevent the use of certain character sequences to include hidden code within an identifier field.

param.name: e
param.span: 要测试无效标识符的对象。

span.span: An object to test for invalid identifiers.

summary.span: 尝试验证指定的 或 树中包含的每个标识符字段。

span.span: Attempts to validate each identifier field contained in the specified or tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的标识符字段对象以包含字段转义字符和隐藏的代码，这会造成安全漏洞。It is possible for the identifier fields of objects to contain field escape characters and hidden code which can allow security violations. 此方法检查每个文本字段中树中的字符，可用于隐藏代码，并在引发异常，如果标识符字段包含无效字符。This method checks the literal fields of each in a tree for characters which could be used to hide code, and throws an exception if an identifier field contains an invalid character. 此方法调用方法以验证在指定每个标识符或树，并在引发异常，如果标识符无效或包含无效字符。This method calls the method to validate each identifier in the specified or tree, and throws an exception if an identifier is invalid or contains invalid characters. 调用此方法并将其传递包含要在生成代码来阻止某些可用于包括标识符字段中的隐藏的代码的字符序列的使用之前生成的代码关系图。Call this method and pass it the containing the code graph to generate before generating code to block the use of certain character sequences that can be used to include hidden code within an identifier field. 此方法不由任何生成代码的方法自动调用。This method is not called automatically by any generate code methods.

exception.span: 指定的 包含无效标识符。

span.span: The specified contains an invalid identifier.

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
